about_the_game:
Heirs of Heaven is a gripping story-driven action-adventure set in a post-apocalyptic world. 
Play as Mate, a young survivor on a mission to find his missing father and uncover the cure for a deadly virus.

The Hilltop Haven: Mate’s mountain refuge is a fragile sanctuary. But secrets linger, and Mate must choose between safety and a daring escape into the unknown.

 

Survival Requires Courage: Armed with limited resources, Mate faces the wilderness head-on, hunting to survive and learning to adapt         



Prepare for Danger: Every moment counts. Scavenge for weapons, manage your inventory, and arm yourself for the threats ahead



Stealth or Strength: Whether you strike from the shadows or engage head-on, the choice is yours. Strategy and precision are key to survival.



Hope Amid the Ruins: Every step brings Mate closer to the truth. Explore stunning environments and forge unlikely alliances in a quest filled with danger, hope, and sacrifice.

  • Engage in tense combat with zombies, mutants, and rogue soldiers.

  • Explore a ruined world, from mountain hideouts to a crumbling city.

  • Scavenge and craft to survive the harsh environment.

  • Face powerful enemies, including terrifying bosses.

  • Experience an emotional journey filled with danger, hope, and sacrifice.

Will you uncover the truth and save humanity? The fight for survival begins now.

name: Heirs of Heaven

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB or AMD RX 580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
  • VR Support: None
  • Additional Notes: A mid-range PC from the past few years should be sufficient to run the game at 1080p with low-to-medium settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K or AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060 or AMD RX 6700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
  • VR Support: None
  • Additional Notes: For a smooth experience at 1080p or 1440p with high-to-ultra settings, a modern gaming PC is recommended.

short_description: Embark on an action-packed journey in a post-apocalyptic world as Mate, a resourceful survivor on a quest to find his missing father and uncover a cure for a deadly virus. Explore dangerous ruins, fight mutants and robotic soldiers, and make allies in this story-driven action-adventure.
